BBEX3.A.CLP.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Chile / USD 1 = CLP ... (middle)
Source: Since 2003: Banco Central de Chile, Santiago de Chile. 1999 - 2002: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of reporting date rates (generally one rate per week); until 2002 calculated on the basis of buying and selling rates.
